pageSetting.title: 中间业务个人业绩查询明细

select.isEqual: select dmms.dmms as ywlx, jxdx.hth, jxdx.khh, mx.lsh jyls, mx.jyrq, jxdx.khmc, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:'||'100' as fpgx, bz.bzzwmc, mx.jyje, mx.sxf from jxdx_sjyhqy jxdx left join jxdx_sjyhjyls mx on mx.hth=jxdx.hth inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jxdx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_dmms dmms on 1=1 and dmms.dmz='$ywlx$' and dmms.dmmc='ZJYW' left join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = mx.bz where coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ and jxdx.hth='$qyh$' and not exists (select 1 from dxgx_yjgx_dzyh h where h.hth = jxdx.hth and jxdxlx= $ywlx$ ) union all select dmms.dmms as ywlx, jxdx.hth, jxdx.khh, mx.lsh jyls, mx.jyrq, jxdx.khmc, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || f_numtochar (gx.zlbl) as fpgx, bz.bzzwmc, mx.jyje, mx.sxf from jxdx_sjyhqy jxdx left join jxdx_sjyhjyls mx on mx.hth=jxdx.hth inner join dxgx_yjgx_dzyh gx on gx.hth = jxdx.hth and jxdxlx = $ywlx$ and coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_dmms dmms on 1=1 and dmms.dmz='$ywlx$' and dmms.dmmc='ZJYW' left join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = mx.bz where coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ and jxdx.hth='$qyh$'

select dmms.dmms as ywlx, jxdx.hth, jxdx.khh, mx.lsh jyls, mx.jyrq, jxdx.khmc, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || '100' as fpgx, bz.bzzwmc, mx.jyje, mx.sxf from jxdx_wyqy jxdx left join jxdx_wyjyls mx on mx.hth=jxdx.hth inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jxdx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_dmms dmms on 1=1 and dmms.dmz='$ywlx$' and dmms.dmmc='ZJYW' left join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = mx.bz where coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ and jxdx.hth='$qyh$' and not exists (select 1 from dxgx_yjgx_dzyh h where h.hth = jxdx.hth and jxdxlx= $ywlx$ ) union all select dmms.dmms as ywlx, jxdx.hth, jxdx.khh, mx.lsh jyls, mx.jyrq, jxdx.khmc, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || f_numtochar (gx.zlbl) as fpgx, bz.bzzwmc, mx.jyje, mx.sxf from jxdx_wyqy jxdx left join jxdx_wyjyls mx on mx.hth=jxdx.hth inner join dxgx_yjgx_dzyh gx on gx.hth = jxdx.hth and jxdxlx = $ywlx$ and coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_dmms dmms on 1=1 and dmms.dmz='$ywlx$' and dmms.dmmc='ZJYW' left join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = mx.bz where coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ and jxdx.hth='$qyh$'

select dmms.dmms as ywlx, jxdx.shdh, mx.lsh jyls, mx.jyrq, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || '100' as fpgx, bz.bzzwmc, mx.jyje, mx.sxf from jxdx_posshdjb jxdx left join jxdx_posjymx mx on mx.hth=jxdx.hth inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jxdx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_dmms dmms on 1=1 and dmms.dmz='$ywlx$' and dmms.dmmc='ZJYW' left join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = mx.bz where coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ and jxdx.hth='$qyh$' and not exists (select 1 from dxgx_yjgx_dzyh h where h.hth = jxdx.hth and jxdxlx= $ywlx$ ) union all select dmms.dmms as ywlx, jxdx.shdh, mx.lsh jyls, mx.jyrq, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || f_numtochar (gx.zlbl) as fpgx, bz.bzzwmc, mx.jyje, mx.sxf from jxdx_posshdjb jxdx left join jxdx_posjymx mx on mx.hth=jxdx.hth inner join dxgx_yjgx_dzyh gx on gx.hth = jxdx.hth and jxdxlx = $ywlx$ and coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join csb_dmms dmms on 1=1 and dmms.dmz='$ywlx$' and dmms.dmmc='ZJYW' left join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = mx.bz where coalesce(mx.jyrq,$sysdate$) between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ and jxdx.hth='$qyh$'
